dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading (i.e. spot shading for deserts).
Vertical bar scales on map given in "Feet."
Shows topography, drainage, islands surrounding continent.
Features mineral resources, mountain ranges, deserts, ocean temparatures and currents.
"Entered according to Act of Congress, in the Year 1858 by J. H. Colton & Co. in the Clerks Office of the District Court of the United States, for the Southern District of New York."
Appears in Colton's General atlas, New York, 1857-1888.
